Dialog.Title: Library Director
Dialog.Content: Does this not remind you of a similar guest we had before?

Dialog.Title: Assistant Librarian
Dialog.Content: You mean that Philip kid? Yeah, they do seem to be kinda similar.

Dialog.Title: Library Director
Dialog.Content: Though this one didn't seem to have gone through the same process as Philip. He did not seem to have been talking to any voice.

Dialog.Title: Assistant Librarian
Dialog.Content: That's true... perhaps the cause is that of a singularity and not of either Distortion or E.G.O?

Dialog.Title: Library Director
Dialog.Content: It is unfortunate that we lack the sufficient knowledge to reach a decisive conclusion.

Dialog.Title: Assistant Librarian
Dialog.Content: I'm fairly certain we will see him again. Just like we will most likely see that kid, Philip, come to the Library too.

Dialog.Title: Assistant Librarian
Dialog.Content: You had said previously that the Library allows its guests to leave for a reason right? Then they'll most likely come back!

Dialog.Title: Library Director
Dialog.Content: Hm... To think I wouldn't remember that fact until you mentioned it...

Dialog.Title: Assistant Librarian
Dialog.Content: Could be a sign that you're closer to turning into a human.

Dialog.Title: Library Director
Dialog.Content: That may just be the case.
